https://github.com/teamact21-source/hierarchical-ai-safety-architecture/discussions

If you still need an Issue (actionable task), fill in below.

## What part are you critiquing?
(Section / diagram / claim)

## Your critique
(What seems wrong or incomplete?)

## Why it matters
(Consequence if this is wrong)

## Proposed fix (optional)
(Concrete improvement, if you have one)
